item.title: BJP District President Challenges Gadwal MLA to Open Debate on Development
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a strongly worded statement, BJP District President Ram Anjaneyulu has thrown an open challenge to Gadwal MLA Krishnamohan Reddy, questioning his development claims and accusing him of switching parties for personal gain.
Addressing a press conference at former minister DK Aruna’s residence, Anjaneyulu alleged that despite 12 years of continuous rule by ruling parties, the Gadwal region — known as Nadigadda — has witnessed little genuine development.
> “The MLA speaks of ₹316 crore ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
